description: From McDonough, Georgia. Mechanical engineering major, industrial design minor.
aspects: My favorite aspect of Lambda Chi would be the diversity. Not just that we're from all parts of the country, but that we all have unique interest. When you join a brotherhood of over one hundred who are all passionate about different things, you constantly learn.
interests: Watersports and being at the lake
quotes: "If I had asked people what they wanted, they would have said faster horses" -Henry Ford
name: Robby Wellden
